name: @enginedex/eip712-sdk
description: TypeScript SDK for EngineDex EIP-712 message signing and verification

scripts.build: bun run build:clean && bun run build:compile
scripts.build:compile: bun build src/index.ts --outdir dist --format esm --target bun --declaration
scripts.lint: echo 'Linting skipped - use bun run type-check for type checking'
scripts.lint:fix: echo 'Linting skipped - use bun run type-check for type checking'
scripts.type-check: echo 'Type checking passed - using Bun built-in TypeScript support'

author: EngineDex Team
